item.title: Fun Intro to K-NN Algorithm
item.description: Machine Learning Nuggets: A fun Introduction to K-NN Algorithm A girl from an orthodox family loved a boy while in college. She informed her parents about this relation and expressed interest that she would like to marry him. She shared all the details about the boy to her parents that she knew. After some usual family drama, parents agreed to the wedding but with one condition that only if the boy passes background check.

item.title: La Liste
item.description: La liste Things I want to do before I die. Please let me know if you have any recommendation. Inspired by Chip’s list here. Get a pet dog Visit Paris Live in another country Get a PhD (in CS, Neuroscience) Scuba Dive Learn to Ski Fly Airplane Learn to Drive a car Become a Parent Start a company Author a book Write a story and direct a short film Publish a paper in top tier conference Body transformation Learn to salsa Learn to play a music instrument (tried 2x) Spend a week in Himalayan Mountains Do a Bible tour Visit Mecca Visit Germany Travel to 50 countries Learn to speak Spanish
